description:
The Crowds are converging on the city of Tachikawa in the tens of thousands. In order to protect the 180 thousand citizens from the Crowds, the G-team coordinates evacuation efforts with the city hall, police, fire department, and the self-defense forces. However, GALAX is unavailable as a resource because Katze has taken over General X. As the G-team struggles to deal with the endless wave of the Crowds, they inevitably find themselves at a disadvantage.
Source: crunchyroll
